EmailTemplate.name: ES-2019-04-11-Austin-invite.ES-2019-04-11 Austin Event invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us for a Brewery Tour and Pints at Austin Beerworks
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}!
Enjoy a cold one with the best and the brightest of Austin's IT community at Austin Beerworks on Thursday, April 11th. Join Freeit, Turbonomic, and HPE for a laid-back private brewery tour along with pints and delicious bites.
During the event, we'll be available to discuss how you can optimize your storage. If you don't want to talk shop, that's fine, come by anyway and enjoy a pint on us!
Register here! <[[https://www.freeitdata.com/events/4-11-abw-austin/]]>
Want to bring a friend? Do it! We'd love to meet them! Feel free to pass these details along. RSVP to secure your spot today!
Sincerely, Team Turbonomic
RSVP: Austin Beerworks Tour & Pints <[[https://www.freeitdata.com/events/4-11-abw-austin/]]> 3001 Industrial Terrace | Austin, TX 78758
Thursday, April 11th | 4-7 pm
